question: As you said that it is not allowed to see the private part of women then how it can be possible to do intercourse without viewing the private part
answer:
QUESTION
As you said that it is not allowed to see the private part of women then how it can be possible to do intercourse without viewing the private part. Is it permissible to be completely necked your wife during intercourse. doesn't she mind it or feel shame and it is permissible for men/women to suck each other toungues during intercourse for pleasure.JazakAllah.
ANSWER


Share:
1. There are two aspects to your query; a) Permissibility, b) Morality.
Islam encourages morality. Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) said,
'Imaan and shame are companions. When one is lifted, the other is also
lifted.' We are encouraged to display modesty during intimate relationships.
It is immodest for the husband and wife to look at one another's private
parts.
2. It is permissible for the husband and wife to arouse one another by
caressing the sensitive organs of one another.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
